title: oregonfrogs: Oregon Spotted A Frog (Rana Pretiosa) — oregonfrogs-package
text: Oregon Frogs Rana Pretiosa dataset contains information radio telemetry frequency used study frogs' habitat. survey run late September November 2018. 311 observations 16 variables.

title: oregonfrogs: Oregon Spotted A Frog (Rana Pretiosa) — oregonfrogs-package

what: Oregon Spotted a Frog (Rana pretiosa) — oregonfrogs
title: Oregon Spotted a Frog (Rana pretiosa) — oregonfrogs
text: Telemetry habitat use Crane Prairie Reservoir Oregon, USA. Radio-telemetry used study late-season movement habitat use Oregon spotted frogs (Rana pretiosa) Crane Prairie Reservoir Oregon. dataset includes individual frog location data habitat use tracking event occurred roughly weekly September late November 2018.

title: Oregon Spotted a Frog (Rana pretiosa) — oregonfrogs
Oregon Spotted a Frog (Rana pretiosa) — oregonfrogs
text: data frame 311 rows 16 cols. Variables: Site character, location Subsite character, location second level (Cow Camp Pond,Cow Camp River,N Res,NE Res,SE Pond,W Res) HabType character,	location third level (Pond,Reservoir,River) SurveyDate character,	date Ordinal character,	Ordinal day January 1, 2018 telemetry data collected Frequency character,	Unique transmitter frequency associated individual frog UTME_83 character,	UTM coordinates (1,000-meter grid squares tenths hundredths) UTMN_83 character,	UTM coordinates (1,000-meter grid squares tenths hundredths) Interval character,	integer (0 12) Female character,	gender - binary (0,1) Water character,	water (Deep water,water,Shallow water,Unknown water) Type character,	water type (Marsh/Pond,Non-aquatic,Reservoir,Stream/Canal) Structure character,	structure (Herbaceous veg,Leaf litter,Open,Woody debris,Woody veg) Substrate character,	substrate (Flocc,Mineral soil,Organic soil,Unknown substrate) Beaver character,	beaver (Burrow,Channel/runway,Lodge,beaver) Detection character,	detection type (Captured,visual,Visual)
